name: Spit Venom
text: You have mastered the nagaji warrior technique of spitting venom into your opponent’s eyes.
benefit: As a full-round action, you can spit poison up to 10 feet as a ranged touch attack. If you hit, the target must make a successful Fortitude save or be blinded for 1d6 rounds. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your total Hit Dice + your Constitution modifier. You can use this ability once per day plus one additional time per day for every three Hit Dice you have.
staminaText: When you spit poison, you can spend up to 5 stamina points. For each stamina point spent, you can increase the range of the attack by 5 feet.
text_zh: 你已经掌握了娜迦裔战士的技巧——将毒素喷入敌人的眼睛。
benefit_zh: 以一个整轮动作，你能够用远程接触攻击将毒液喷出10尺远。如果你命中目标，他必须进行一次成功的强韧豁免，否则将会目盲1d6轮。豁免DC等同于“10+1/2总生命骰+体质修正”。每天你能够使用该能力1次，每拥有3个HD时额外再增加1次。
staminaText_zh: 当你喷吐毒药时，你可以消耗5点耐力。你消耗的每点耐力都会将这次攻击的距离提升5尺。
